snippet: New York State’s comptroller, Thomas DiNapoli, wants to use his financial clout to get a major company to disclose its political contributions.
abstract: Editorial supports suit filed by New York State comptroller Thomas DiNapoli aimed at forcing computer chip manufacturer Qualcomm to disclose its internal records on political spending; notes state's pension fund owns almost $380 million in Qualcomm stock.
